name: Hero Emblems
storyline:
"Three thousand years ago, the ancient God of Evil captured the Shayara Kingdom. In those desperate times, four heroes rose to defeat the God of Evil with all their might. These heroes were the only few who had the abilities of the legendary emblems. 
They are: 
 
Hale possessed the offensive, destructive “Holy Sword Emblem “ 
Erica possessed the magical, deadly “Supreme Magic Emblem “ 
Angus possessed the protective, sacrificial “Dragon Shield Emblem “ 
Thera possessed the healing, miraculous  “Great Angel Emblem “ 
 
The heroic tales of these 4 heroes have been passed down for generations. Now… the ancient God of Evil is re-awakening and its vicious claws have already left their marks on the King of Shayara, causing him to lay in an eternal slumber 
 
To stop the God of Evil from resurrecting… 
New generation of heroes, are you ready?"
summary: "Hero Emblems is a JRPG that mixes “Side-scrolling beat' em up” and “Match-3” features. Set in the middle-ages fantasy world of sword-fighting and wizardry, it is an adventure of 4 brave warriors who wield different emblem powers and their attempts to stop the re-awakening of the God of Evil."
